statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={4.1} , \displaystyle{b}={7.4}, \displaystyle{c}={9.5}, and \displaystyle{d}={11.3}, with diagonal length \displaystyle{e}={9.1} from the intersection of a and d to the intersection of b and c . Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
